title: Ai Doll

alternative_titles.ja: 哀・奴隷 （あい・どーる）

synopsis:
The story of young Rachel is a sad one. Orphaned as a small child, abused by a jealous rival, and the object of lust by those who are supposed to be caretakers, she still tries to maintain a positive attitude about her future. Aided by her only friend Beth, her budding romance with Prince Andrew falls under jeopardy when a distant relative whisks her away for purposes unknown.

(Source: ANN)
